tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE rental_locations (
    location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    operating_hours VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE rental_inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES rental_locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rental_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    rental_date DATE,
    return_date DATE,
    rental_fee DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE rentals (
    rental_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    rental_date DATE,
    return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE rental_locations (
   location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   address TEXT NOT NULL,
   contact_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   operating_hours TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE rental_inventory (
   inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   location_id INT NOT NULL,
   category_id INT NOT NULL,
   quantity INT NOT NULL,
   price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES rental_locations(location_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES rental_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rental_transactions (
   transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   customer_id INT NOT NULL,
   location_id INT NOT NULL,
   transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
   total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES rental_customers(customer_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES rental_locations(location_id)
);
